Text 18.0.5 (Properties of the set of maximizers). Let Unknown identifier `C`C be a convex set in and let Unknown identifier `h`h be a linear functional. Define Unknown identifier `C'`C' as the set of points where Unknown identifier `h`h attains its maximum over Unknown identifier `C`C, so Unknown identifier `C'`sorry = {x | x sorry sorry = sorry} : PropC' = {x Unknown identifier `C`C | Unknown identifier `h`h x = Unknown identifier ``} where Unknown identifier ``sorry = sorry : Prop = Unknown identifier `sup_C`sup_C h.

def maximizers (C : Set F) (h : F [] ) : Set F := {x : F | x C IsMaxOn (fun x => h x) C x}

Membership in the set of maximizers amounts to being in Unknown identifier `C`C and maximizing Unknown identifier `h`h on Unknown identifier `C`C.

lemma mem_maximizers_iff {C : Set F} {h : F [] } {x : F} : x maximizers C h x C y C, h y h x := by constructor intro hx rcases hx with hxC, hxmax exact hxC, (isMaxOn_iff).1 hxmax intro hx rcases hx with hxC, hxmax exact hxC, (isMaxOn_iff).2 hxmax

Any two maximizers have the same objective value.

lemma h_eq_of_mem_maximizers {C : Set F} {h : F [] } {x y : F} (hx : x maximizers C h) (hy : y maximizers C h) : h x = h y := by rcases (mem_maximizers_iff (x := x)).1 hx with hxC, hxmax rcases (mem_maximizers_iff (x := y)).1 hy with hyC, hymax exact le_antisymm (hymax x hxC) (hxmax y hyC)

A point in Unknown identifier `C`C with the same value as a maximizer is itself a maximizer.

lemma mem_maximizers_of_mem_of_eq_value {C : Set F} {h : F [] } {x x' : F} (hx : x maximizers C h) (hx'C : x' C) (hxeq : h x' = h x) : x' maximizers C h := by rcases (mem_maximizers_iff (x := x)).1 hx with _, hxmax refine (mem_maximizers_iff (x := x')).2 ?_ refine hx'C, ?_ intro y hyC simpa [hxeq] using (hxmax y hyC)

Linear functionals agree on convex combinations of maximizers.

lemma h_convexCombo_eq_max {C : Set F} {h : F [] } {x y : F} {a b : } (hx : x maximizers C h) (hy : y maximizers C h) (hab : a + b = 1) : h (a x + b y) = h x := by have hxhy : h x = h y := h_eq_of_mem_maximizers (x := x) (y := y) hx hy calc h (a x + b y) = h (a x) + h (b y) := by simp _ = a h x + b h y := by rw [h.map_smul, h.map_smul] _ = a h x + b h x := by simp [hxhy] _ = (a + b) h x := by rw [ add_smul] _ = h x := by simp [hab]
